about.title: Hello there!
about.content:
Hi there, I'm Youenn Pennarun. I am a student in science computing specialized in application development. Autonomous, Curious and Self-educated, I'm always trying to improve my programming skills
I am also a music lover

studies.title: M1
content: Formal methods for the development of safe application

studies.title: Higher national diploma in computer science
content: Web Programming (PHP, SQL, HTML), Java, C

professional_experiences.title: Intern as a fullstack javascript déveloper
professional_experiences.description: Development of a customer relationship management application. I also developed an API for the customers' area and a webservice for a partner of AcommeAssure

professional_experiences.title: Internship in web development in irlande
professional_experiences.description: Development of a departmental publications management application in PHP.

projects.name: homyPi
projects.description: Ceci est un projet personnel en cours de développement. Cette application permet de programmer un réveil sur un Raspberry Pi. Les morceaux joués sont sélectionnés dans des playlists généré en fonction des artistes présent dans les playlists Spotify de l'utilisateur. Cela permet de se réveiller chaque matin avec une chanson différente ayant de forte chances de plaire a l'utilisateur.

projects.name: arduino light switcher
projects.description: This project is my Bachelor Degree project. The project goal was to turn on and off a light remotely with and Arduino card for the hardware and a web server
